meanings.definition: A tile-matching puzzle video game in which players manipulate falling blocks to create complete lines.
meanings.sent1: Playing tetris helps improve hand-eye coordination.
meanings.sent2: I love challenging my friends to a game of tetris.
meanings.sent3: After hours of playing tetris, I started seeing falling blocks in my dreams.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts fell into place like a game of tetris, forming a clear picture.
meanings.sent5: The sound of completing a line in tetris is so satisfying.

meanings.definition: The act of arranging or fitting together in a compact and orderly manner.
meanings.sent1: She packed the moving boxes with tetris-like precision.
meanings.sent2: The books on the shelf were stacked in a perfect tetris formation.
meanings.sent3: His suitcase was packed with such tetris expertise that everything fit perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The team worked together like a well-oiled tetris machine, fitting each piece seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces fit together like a game of tetris, creating a beautiful picture.
